means: 选择，挑选( select的过去式和过去分词 )

word_mean: selected-area diffraction 在透射电子显微成像镜物镜的后焦面上对样品的微小区域衍射成像，并用电子透镜放大的衍射图像。

sentence.Network_en: She selected a low gear and started down the track carefully.
sentence.Network_cn: 她选了低速挡小心翼翼地沿小径下行。

sentence.Network_en: Price quotes on selected product categories will be sent on request.
sentence.Network_cn: 所选产品类别的报价承索即寄。

sentence.Network_en: The sample was selected from the medical records of two general practices.
sentence.Network_cn: 样本选自两个全科诊所的病历档案。

research on medical instruments selection of hospital integration operating room ., 关于医院一体化手术室医疗设备选型的研究.
可选择性(selectivity)：比较一下列中唯一键的数量和表中的行数，就可以判断该列的可选择性。如果该列的”唯一键的数量/表中的行数…

entry.def: If you select something, you choose it from a number of things of the same kind.

example.ex: Voters are selecting candidates for both US Senate seats and for 52 congressional seats...
example.tran: 选民正在为美国参议院议席和 52 个众议院议席挑选候选人。

example.ex: With a difficult tee shot, select a club which will keep you short of the trouble...
example.tran: 开球难度较大时，选一根好使的高尔夫球杆。

entry.tran: (在屏幕上)选定(某文件或某段文本以作特别处理)
entry.def: If you select a file or a piece of text on a computer screen, you click on it so that it is marked in a different colour, usually in order for you to give the computer an instruction relating to that file or piece of text.

example.ex: I selected a file and pressed the Delete key.
example.tran: 我选定了一个文件，按下了删除键。

entry.tran: 精选的;作为…精华的;优等的
entry.def: A select group is a small group of some of the best people or things of their kind.

example.ex: He was one of the small select group assembled by Penney, at the High Explosive Research centre.
example.tran: 他是彭尼在烈性炸药研究中心召集的精英小组的一员。

entry.tran: 第一流的;只为富人(或上层人士)而设的;高级的
entry.def: If you describe something as select, you mean it has many desirable features, but is available only to people who have a lot of money or who belong to a high social class.

example.ex: Christian Lacroix is throwing a very lavish and very select party.
example.tran: 克里斯汀·拉克鲁瓦正在举办一个非常豪华的上流聚会。

example.ex: ...a meeting of a very select club.

Sentence.sentence: And it includes alternative schools with students selected by lottery(抽签),such as H-B Wood lawn in Arlington, Va.
